mapper.update: MERGE INTO club USING DUAL ON (c_id = #{c_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET c_name=#{c_name},c_content=#{c_content},c_category=#{c_category},c_membermax=#{c_membermax},c_hashtag=#{c_hashtag},c_img=#{c_img},c_ask=#{c_ask} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (c_id,c_name,c_content,c_category,c_membercnt,c_membermax,c_hashtag,c_img,c_openingdate,c_ask) VALUES(#{c_id},#{c_name},#{c_content},#{c_category},1,#{c_membermax},#{c_hashtag},#{c_img},to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm'),#{c_ask})
mapper.select: SELECT a.cm_intro,a.cm_joindate,b.m_nickname,b.m_img,a.m_id FROM c_member a, member b WHERE a.cm_rank = 40 AND a.c_id = #{c_id} AND a.m_id = b.m_id
SELECT a.c_id,a.cm_intro,b.m_nickname,a.cm_joindate,a.cm_rank,b.m_img,a.m_id FROM c_member a, member b WHERE c_id=#{c_id} AND a.m_id = b.m_id AND a.cm_rank in (10,20,30) ORDER BY cm_rank
